pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuniyo anabhiratiyā pīḷitā ovarakaṁ pavisitvā talaghātakaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.3_0: Bhikkhuniyo tena saddena upadhāvitvā tā bhikkhuniyo etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.5_0: “Na mayaṁ, ayye, purisena saddhiṁ sampadussāmā”ti bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.6_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.11_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo talaghātakaṁ karissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.13_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.2_0: samphassaṁ sādiyantī antamaso uppalapattenapi muttakaraṇe pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
